content.raw: Thank you for the kind words.   It would be great to have some more time, but in order to run the competition, generate the scores and create a summary before the RobotX Interactive event, we need to stick to the schedule.  Hopefully the VRX challenge will help your team prepare for the 2020 RobotX competition.  We hope to keep adding to the simulation, including some of the 2020 tasks.
content.html: Thank you for the kind words. It would be great to have some more time, but in order to run the competition, generate the scores and create a summary before the RobotX Interactive event, we need to stick to the schedule. Hopefully the VRX challenge will help your team prepare for the 2020 RobotX competition. We hope to keep adding to the simulation, including some of the 2020 tasks.
